reviews.review: a really good game i enjoy it very much but the problem that there is no anti-cheat and there are a lot of cheaters
Hackers is the big problem, and valve is not fixing it becuase people buy more accounts when they get ban.

Honestly, I've been wanting to do this for a while now. This game has really seen it days. One of the biggest games in esports, to a game that has to push their new operation as a "battle pass." Now don't get me wrong, their operations has always been a battle pass, but it hit differently before the whole battle royale scene was around and everyone started hopping on the battle pass hype. Secondly, this games matchmaking system has gone done the drain badly. I've tried to play this game many times since I've stopped, and every time I go back to it I regret it severely. My mind and my body can not handle the wear and stress this game has given me in the past years.

TL:DR
Wait for the new game from Riot Games "Project A," Looks great, probably gonna wash CSGO out of the water.
